dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on building trust and gathering information during this round. Let's share any suspicious observations or interactions we have had with Charlie and Bob. We want to identify the assassin and ensure the safety of our group.

dialogue.speaker: Bob
